about_the_game:
Sacred of Gates : Tinder Embark on a Journey Through Enchanting Norse Landscapes,a captivating game that unfolds a rich tapestry of Nordic folklore and the age. Dive into the contradictions embedded within countless myths and embark on an intense journey of storytelling and immersive gameplay.

Once upon a time, as the Twilight of the Gods descended, a catastrophic event shattered the Cosmic Oak, releasing potent energy shards known as the "Divine Sparks" across the vast multiverse.

Your Role as the Destined Hero

As the destined hero, your fate lies ahead on this mythical continent, where you will forge your own legendary tale. Enter the realm of Norse Fantasy mythology and embark on an odyssey beneath the awe-inspiring and colossal Cosmic Oak.

Explore a Norse Fantasy Open World

Marvel at breathtaking vistas with every stride as you traverse a cutting-edge dynamic weather system, featuring diverse weather conditions shifting in real-time.

Conquer Legendary Monsters

Be the bravest warrior and confront the fiercest adversaries. Join forces with your comrades to vanquish formidable legendary monsters and prove your worth.

Engage in Global Conquest Campaigns

Fight for the glory of your faction in real-time land battles across all servers. Lead a crack squadron, carve your path through the battlefield, and let your fame reverberate across the globe.

Customize Your Mythic Avatar

Employ the latest facial capture technology to meticulously customize your character's facial features and even skin tone. Unbound by skin color and body type, embark on your adventure with your preferred image and make your mark on the world of Midgard.

Craft Your Skill Matrix

Tailor exclusive abilities for diverse combat scenarios with the skill matrix system. Leverage your unique skills and emerge victorious in every battle.

name: Sacred of Gates : Tinder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: ntel core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000/ Nvidia GeForce 710/AMD
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: ntel core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000/ Nvidia GeForce 710/AMD
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

Dive into the contradictions embedded within countless myths and embark on an intense journey of storytelling and immersive gameplay.
